It's the morning of Matty's Birthday and his girlfriend Sophie brings him some cake for breakfast. He eats all the cake leaving not a crumb and then he is surprised as Sophie brings in a full cooked breakfast too!
'Wow, is that all for me?'
'Yeah, of course,' Soph said 'It is your birthday!'
'Well that is true' Matty says with a smile. He polishes off the breakfast and lies content in bed for 30 mins, getting frisky with Sophie even though he felt pretty full. Finally he decides he should get up and get dressed, after all he was arranging a party for the night and needed to fetch some supplies.

Once at the supermarket he cant resist picking up a bag of sweets here, and a soda here, and eats them in the car on the way home. He unpacks all the party stuff, and then decides to go out for lunch. He goes to a fast food joint and has the deluxe, after all it is his birthday! When he gets home he decides to have a sleep for an hour or two and wakes up at 5pm. He now has 3 hours to get ready so he sets up the house, putting crisps into bowls (and eating a good few bags himself, good job he bought plenty!) He then sets up the booze, has a couple of cans himself, and puts the pizzas, chips, burgers and wedges into the oven. Leaving them he goes for a shower. He gets out and gets dressed, puts on a new shirt he had been given for his birthday. It felt tight to him but guesses that its a 'Small' small. Oh well! He finishes preparing the food and starts picking at the chips and having a few beers waiting for his guests to arrive. The doorbell rings and Matty is alarmed because he had almost fallen asleep eating chips and drinking beer. He has finished the fries so gets rid of the dish and opens the door.

The first of the 100 guests to arrive is . . . .

1111121221211.content:
Walking through the store, he saw a lot of shirts that he really liked. His normal size was small, so he tried on the mediums in the dressing room. They were almost perfect. He could still see a bulge beneath the current shirt, but it wasn't too bad considering that he still had the other one on underneath. As he examined himself in the mirror, he could see the small changes that had occurred to his body in the past three weeks. His cheeks seemed slightly swollen, and he noticed the beginning of a small double chin. His wrist bones no longer showed quite as large as they had before. Even his fingers looked like they had increased in diameter. As he looked down at his flip-flopped feet, he saw that they looked wider than before. His toes didn't have as much space in between each other anymore. Furthermore, his arms lacked the definition he remembered them having. They seemed to spread as he pushed them back to his sides.

After making these slightly troubling observations, Matty took that shirt off and tried on the next one. It seemed a bit more snug than the last one did. He took it off and compared it to the previous shirts. All of them were the same size. "It must be my imagination," he said. Now he saw that about an inch of his stomach was showing under his favorite shirt. He pulled up his sweat pants once more, which left the sides of his feet uncovered. This made him realize that he had pulled them up as far as he could without looking like he was wearing floods. The pants and his shirt were both obviously high on his stomach, but he couldn't allow his gut to hang out.

As he walked out of the dressing room, he saw someone he went to high school with, a guy named Tim. He hadn't seen Tim in such a long time. Matty remembered making fun of his skinny arms and legs back in his senior year. Now, on the other hand, Tim really had filled out. His weight, however, was distributed throughout his body as solid muscle. He went through quite a transformation from the shrimpy kid in the class to what looked like a top football player.

Tim: "Matty!"
Matty: "Oh, hi! It's been quite a while since I've seen you around. How are you?"
Tim: "I'm doing great. I just got married last week. I'm doing some last minute shopping for my honeymoon. I had to find some new swimming trunks. I've gained a lot of weight since I wore my last ones."
Matty: "Congratulations! You look great. You've changed so much."
Tim: "Looks like youv'e done some changing too. Way to pack on the pounds."
Matty: "Thanks, I try my best. Anyway, I have to get back to my girlfriend. She'll go nuts if she doesn't at least get three things that she wants. I'll talk to you later. Bye!"

Matty walked away from Tim, livid at the remark that his old buddy had made about his chubbiness. He soon found Clarrie and persuaded her to leave the store after buying his new shirts. info.brief_description: Matty is just finding out that maybe he can't eat what he wants and not gain weight
info.description:
Matty is at his 20th Birthday Party when a few old friends turn up and notice something he hasn't, he can't eat whatever he likes and NOT gain weight. The weight is rising bit by bit. One path of this story incorporates two of my other characters Brad and Kyle, who are themselves realising that the weight can soon rise!

This is renamed as Matty's Ultimate weight gain story, and was originally called 'Male slight weight gain story.'

Add and enjoy as we fatten up some great characters online @ www.writing.com
